00077 EXTERNC int minet_init (minet_socket_types type)
00078 {
00079     if (type == MINET_KERNEL)
00080     {
00081         socket_type = KERNEL_SOCKS;
00082     }
00083     else if(type == MINET_USER)
00084     {
00085         socket_type = MINET_SOCKS;
00086         MinetInit(MINET_SOCKLIB_MODULE);
00087         sock = MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_SOCK_MODULE) ? MinetConnect(MINET_SOCK_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00088         if (sock==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_SOCK_MODULE))
00089         {
00090             MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't connect to sock_module"));
00091             DEBUGPRINTF(1, "socklib in minet_init(): Can't connect to sock_module. Check that the sock_module loaded successfully.\n");
00092             socket_type=UNINIT_SOCKS;
00093             return socket_type;
00094         }
00095         MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("socklib up"));
00096     }
00097     else
00098     {
00099         DEBUGPRINTF(1, "socklib in minet_init(): Invalid argument. Must be MINET_KERNEL or MINET_USER.\n");
00100         socket_type = UNINIT_SOCKS;
00101     }
00102 
00103     return (socket_type);
00104 }
00105 
00120 EXTERNC int minet_deinit ()
00121 {
00122     if (socket_type == MINET_SOCKS)
00123     {
00124         MinetDeinit();
00125     }
00126     socket_type = UNINIT_SOCKS;
00127     return (socket_type);
00128 }
00129 
00177 EXTERNC int minet_error ()
00178 {
00179     switch (socket_type)
00180     {
00181     case UNINIT_SOCKS:
00182         errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
00183         return (-1);
00184         break;
00185     case KERNEL_SOCKS:
00186         return (errno);
00187         break;
00188     case MINET_SOCKS:
00189         return (minet_errno);
00190         break;
00191     default:
00192         minet_errno = ENODEV;
00193         return minet_errno;
00194     }
00195 }

00225 EXTERNC int minet_perror (const char *s)
00226 {
00227     switch (socket_type)
00228     {
00229     case UNINIT_SOCKS:
00230         errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
00231         return (-1);
00232         break;
00233     case KERNEL_SOCKS:
00234         perror (s);
00235         return (0);
00236         break;
00237     case MINET_SOCKS:
00238         cerr << s;
00239         switch (minet_errno)
00240         {
00241         case EOK:
00242             cerr << ": Ok" << endl;
00243             break;
00244         case ENOMATCH:
00245             cerr << ": No match found" << endl;
00246             break;
00247         case EBUF_SPACE:
00248             cerr << ": Buffer space error" << endl;
00249             break;
00250         case EUNKNOWN:
00251             cerr << ": Unknown error" << endl;
00252             break;
00253         case ERESOURCE_UNAVAIL:
00254             cerr << ": Resource unavailable" << endl;
00255             break;
00256         case EINVALID_OP:
00257             cerr << ": Invalid operation" << endl;
00258             break;
00259         case ENOT_IMPLEMENTED:
00260             cerr << ": Function not implemented" << endl;
00261             break;
00262         case ENOT_SUPPORTED:
00263             cerr << ": Not supported" << endl;
00264             break;
00265         case EWOULD_BLOCK:
00266             cerr << ": Would block" << endl;
00267             break;
00268         case ECONN_FAILED:
00269             cerr << ": Connection failed" << endl;
00270             break;
00271         default:
00272             cerr << ": Unknown error"<<endl;
00273         }
00274         return (0);
00275         break;
00276     default:
00277         cerr << s << ": UNKNOWN SOCKET TYPE"<<endl;
00278         minet_errno=ENODEV;
00279         return -1;
00280         break;
00281     }
00282 }
00283 
00330 EXTERNC int minet_socket (int type)
00331 {
00332     switch (socket_type)
00333     {
00334     case UNINIT_SOCKS:
00335         errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
00336         return (-1);
00337         break;
00338     case KERNEL_SOCKS:
00339         if ((type == SOCK_STREAM) || (type == SOCK_DGRAM))
00340             return (socket (AF_INET, type, 0));
00341         break;
00342     case MINET_SOCKS:
00343     {
00344         SockLibRequestResponse slrr;
00345         switch (type)
00346         {
00347         case SOCK_STREAM:
00348             slrr = SockLibRequestResponse(mSOCKET,
00349                                           Connection(IP_ADDRESS_ANY,
00350                                                      IP_ADDRESS_ANY,
00351                                                      TCP_PORT_NONE,
00352                                                      TCP_PORT_NONE,
00353                                                      IP_PROTO_TCP),
00354                                           UNSPECIFIED_SOCK,
00355                                           Buffer(),
00356                                           0, 0);
00357             break;
00358         case SOCK_DGRAM:
00359             slrr = SockLibRequestResponse(mSOCKET,
00360                                           Connection(IP_ADDRESS_ANY,
00361                                                      IP_ADDRESS_ANY,
00362                                                      UDP_PORT_NONE,
00363                                                      UDP_PORT_NONE,
00364                                                      IP_PROTO_UDP),
00365                                           UNSPECIFIED_SOCK,
00366                                           Buffer(),
00367                                           0, 0);
00368             break;
00369         }
00370         MinetSend(sock,slrr);
00371         MinetReceive(sock,slrr);
00372         minet_errno = slrr.error;
00373         if (minet_errno != EOK)
00374             return (-1);
00375         return (slrr.sockfd);
00376     }
00377     break;
00378     default:
00379         minet_errno=ENODEV;
00380         return -1;
00381         break;
00382     }
00383     minet_errno=ENODEV;
00384     return -1;
00385 }

00435 EXTERNC int minet_bind (int sockfd, struct sockaddr_in *myaddr)
00436 {
00437     switch (socket_type)
00438     {
00439     case UNINIT_SOCKS:
00440         errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
00441         return (-1);
00442         break;
00443     case KERNEL_SOCKS:
00444         return (bind (sockfd, (sockaddr *) myaddr, sizeof(*myaddr)));
00445         break;
00446     case MINET_SOCKS:
00447     {
00448         SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mBIND,
00449                                     Connection(IPAddress(ntohl((unsigned)myaddr->sin_addr.s_addr)),
00450                                                IP_ADDRESS_ANY,
00451                                                (unsigned short)
00452                                                ntohs(myaddr->sin_port),
00453                                                PORT_NONE,
00454                                                0),
00455                                     sockfd,
00456                                     Buffer(),
00457                                     0, 0);
00458         //    cerr << slrr << endl;
00459         MinetSend(sock,slrr);
00460         MinetReceive(sock,slrr);
00461         minet_errno = slrr.error;
00462         if (minet_errno != EOK)
00463             return (-1);
00464         return (0);
00465     }
00466     break;
00467     default:
00468         minet_errno=ENODEV;
00469         return -1;
00470     }
00471 }

00501 EXTERNC int minet_listen (int sockfd, int backlog)
00502 {
00503     switch (socket_type)
00504     {
00505     case UNINIT_SOCKS:
00506         errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
00507         return (-1);
00508         break;
00509     case KERNEL_SOCKS:
00510         return (listen (sockfd, backlog));
00511         break;
00512     case MINET_SOCKS:
00513     {
00514         SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mLISTEN,
00515                                     Connection(),
00516                                     sockfd,
00517                                     Buffer(),
00518                                     0, 0);
00519         MinetSend(sock,slrr);
00520         MinetReceive(sock,slrr);
00521         minet_errno = slrr.error;
00522         if (minet_errno != EOK)
00523             return (-1);
00524         return (0);
00525     }
00526     break;
00527     default:
00528         minet_errno=ENODEV;
00529         return -1;
00530     }
00531 }

00590 EXTERNC int minet_accept (int sockfd, struct sockaddr_in *addr)
00591 {
00592     socklen_t length = sizeof(*addr);
00593     switch (socket_type)
00594     {
00595     case UNINIT_SOCKS:
00596         errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
00597         return (-1);
00598         break;
00599     case KERNEL_SOCKS:
00600         return (accept (sockfd, (sockaddr *) addr, &length));
00601         break;
00602     case MINET_SOCKS:
00603     {
00604         SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mACCEPT,
00605                                     Connection(IP_ADDRESS_ANY,
00606                                                IPAddress((unsigned)
00607                                                          addr->sin_addr.s_addr),
00608                                                TCP_PORT_NONE,
00609                                                (unsigned short)
00610                                                addr->sin_port,
00611                                                0),
00612                                     sockfd,
00613                                     Buffer(),
00614                                     0, 0);
00615         MinetSend(sock,slrr);
00616         MinetReceive(sock,slrr);
00617         minet_errno = slrr.error;
00618         if (minet_errno != EOK)
00619             return (-1);
00620         return (slrr.sockfd);
00621     }
00622     break;
00623     default:
00624         minet_errno=ENODEV;
00625         return -1;
00626     }
00627 }

00694 EXTERNC int minet_connect (int sockfd, struct sockaddr_in *addr)
00695 {
00696         switch (socket_type)
00697     {
00698     case UNINIT_SOCKS:
00699         errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
00700         return (-1);
00701         break;
00702     case KERNEL_SOCKS:
00703         return (connect (sockfd, (sockaddr *) addr, sizeof(*addr)));
00704         break;
00705     case MINET_SOCKS:
00706     {
00707         SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mCONNECT,
00708                                     Connection(IP_ADDRESS_ANY,
00709                                                IPAddress(ntohl((unsigned)
00710                                                                addr->sin_addr.s_addr)),
00711                                                TCP_PORT_NONE,
00712                                                ntohs((unsigned short)
00713                                                      addr->sin_port),
00714                                                0),
00715                                     sockfd,
00716                                     Buffer(),
00717                                     0, 0);
00718 
00719                 debug(3) << "socklib: Connecting to: " << slrr.connection.dest << std::endl;
00720 
00721         MinetSend(sock,slrr);
00722         MinetReceive(sock,slrr);
00723         minet_errno = slrr.error;
00724         if (minet_errno != EOK)
00725         {
00726                 debug(1) << "socklib: minet_connect() failed." << std::endl;
00727             return (-1);
00728         }
00729         return (0);
00730     }
00731     break;
00732     default:
00733         minet_errno=ENODEV;
00734         return -1;
00735     }
00736 }

00778 EXTERNC int minet_read (int fd, char *buf, int len)
00779 {
00780     switch (socket_type)
00781     {
00782     case UNINIT_SOCKS:
00783         errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
00784         return (-1);
00785         break;
00786     case KERNEL_SOCKS:
00787         return (read (fd, buf, len));
00788         break;
00789     case MINET_SOCKS:
00790     {
00791         SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mREAD,
00792                                     Connection(),
00793                                     fd,
00794                                     Buffer(buf, len),
00795                                     0, 0);
00796         MinetSend(sock,slrr);
00797         MinetReceive(sock,slrr);
00798         minet_errno = slrr.error;
00799         if (minet_errno != EOK)
00800             return (-1);
00801         Buffer b;
00802         b = slrr.data;
00803         b.GetData(buf, b.GetSize(), 0);
00804         return (b.GetSize());
00805     }
00806     break;
00807     default:
00808         minet_errno=ENODEV;
00809         return -1;
00810         break;
00811     }
00812 }

00946 EXTERNC int minet_recvfrom (int fd, char *buf, int len,
00947                             struct sockaddr_in *from)
00948 {
00949     socklen_t length = sizeof(*from);
00950     switch (socket_type)
00951     {
00952     case UNINIT_SOCKS:
00953         errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
00954         return (-1);
00955         break;
00956     case KERNEL_SOCKS:
00957         return (recvfrom (fd, buf, len, 0, (sockaddr *) from, &length));
00958         break;
00959     case MINET_SOCKS:
00960     {
00961         SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mRECVFROM,
00962                                     Connection(IP_ADDRESS_ANY,
00963                                                IPAddress((unsigned)
00964                                                          from->sin_addr.s_addr),
00965                                                UDP_PORT_NONE,
00966                                                (unsigned short)
00967                                                from->sin_port,
00968                                                0),
00969                                     fd,
00970                                     Buffer(buf, len),
00971                                     0, 0);
00972         MinetSend(sock,slrr);
00973         MinetReceive(sock,slrr);
00974         minet_errno = slrr.error;
00975         if (minet_errno != EOK)
00976             return (-1);
00977         return (0);
00978     }
00979     break;
00980     default:
00981         minet_errno=ENODEV;
00982         return -1;
00983         break;
00984     }
00985 }

01047         break;

01049     {
01050         SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mCLOSE,
01051                                     Connection(),
01052                                     sockfd,
01053                                     Buffer(),
01054                                     0, 0);
01055         MinetSend(sock,slrr);
01056         MinetReceive(sock,slrr);
01057         minet_errno = slrr.error;
01058         if (minet_errno != EOK)
01059             return (-1);

01061     }
01062     break;

01077                           fd_set         *minet_read_fds,

01175             else if (FD_ISSET(j, &minet_write_fifos)) ctr++;

01189 EXTERNC int minet_select_ex (int             minet_maxfd,
01190                              fd_set         *minet_read_fds,
01191                              fd_set         *minet_write_fds,
01192                              fd_set         *minet_except_fds,
01193                              int             unix_maxfd,
01194                              fd_set         *unix_read_fds,
01195                              fd_set         *unix_write_fds,

01197                              struct timeval *timeout)
01198 {

01212                 select(unix_maxfd, unix_read_fds, unix_write_fds,
01213                        unix_except_fds, timeout));
01214 #endif
01215         break;
01216     case MINET_SOCKS:
01217 #if SELECTPOLL_BROKEN
01218         return ENOT_IMPLEMENTED;
01219 #else
01220         fd_set minet_read_fifos, minet_write_fifos, minet_except_fifos;
01221         FD_ZERO(&minet_read_fifos);
01222         FD_ZERO(&minet_write_fifos);
01223         FD_ZERO(&minet_except_fifos);

01225         {
01226 #if 0
01227             if (FD_ISSET(fd, minet_read_fds))
01228             {
01229                 fd = open(sock2app_fifo_name, O_RDONLY);
01230                 FD_SET(fd, &minet_read_fifos);
01231             }
01232             else if (FD_ISSET(fd, minet_write_fds))
01233             {
01234                 fd = open(app2sock_fifo_name, O_WRONLY);
01235                 FD_SET(fd, &minet_write_fifos);
01236             }

01238             {
01239                 fd = open(app2sock_fifo_name, O_WRONLY);
01240                 FD_SET(fd, &minet_except_fifos);
01241             };
01242 #else
01243         if (FD_ISSET(fd, minet_read_fds))
01244         {
01245             FD_SET(fd, &minet_read_fifos);
01246         }
01247         else if (FD_ISSET(fd, minet_write_fds))
01248         {
01249             FD_SET(fd, &minet_write_fifos);
01250         }
01251         else if (FD_ISSET(fd, minet_except_fds))
01252         {
01253             FD_SET(fd, &minet_except_fifos);
01254         };
01255 #endif
01256         }
01257         //int numfds = select(minet_maxfd, &minet_read_fifos, &minet_write_fifos,
01258         //&minet_except_fifos, timeout);
01259         SockLibRequestResponse slrr;
01260         if (numfds)
01261         {
01262             slrr = SockLibRequestResponse(mSELECT,
01263                                           Connection(),
01264                                           UNSPECIFIED_SOCK,
01265                                           Buffer(),
01266                                           0,
01267                                           ESET_SELECT,
01268                                           minet_read_fifos,
01269                                           minet_write_fifos,
01270                                           minet_except_fifos);
01271 
01272             MinetSend(sock,slrr);
01273             MinetReceive(sock,slrr);
01274         }
01275         else
01276         {
01277             slrr = SockLibRequestResponse(mSELECT,
01278                                           Connection(),
01279                                           UNSPECIFIED_SOCK,
01280                                           Buffer(),
01281                                           0,
01282                                           ECLEAR_SELECT,
01283                                           minet_read_fifos,
01284                                           minet_write_fifos,
01285                                           minet_except_fifos);
01286 
01287             MinetSend(sock,slrr);
01288             MinetReceive(sock,slrr);
01289         }
01290         int ctr=0;
01291         for (int j=0; j<minet_maxfd+1; j++)
01292         {
01293             if (FD_ISSET(j, &minet_read_fifos)) ctr++;
01294             else if (FD_ISSET(j, &minet_write_fifos)) ctr++;
01295             else if (FD_ISSET(j, &minet_except_fifos)) ctr++;
01296         }
01297         return ctr;
01298 
01299         // NO NO NO NO
01300         //    return (ctr ||
01301         //    select(unix_maxfd, unix_read_fds, unix_write_fds,
01302         //         unix_except_fds, timeout));
01303 #endif
01304         break;
01305     default:
01306         minet_errno=ENODEV;
01307         return -1;
01308         break;
01309     }
01310 }
01311 
01312 
01313 EXTERNC int minet_poll (struct pollfd *minet_fds,
01314                         int            num_minet_fds,
01315                         int            timeout)
01316 {
01317     switch (socket_type)
01318     {
01319     case UNINIT_SOCKS:
01320         errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
01321         return (-1);
01322         break;
01323     case KERNEL_SOCKS:
01324         return (poll (minet_fds, num_minet_fds, timeout));
01325         break;
01326     case MINET_SOCKS:
01327 #if SELECTPOLL_BROKEN
01328         return ENOT_IMPLEMENTED;
01329 #else
01330         struct pollfd *minet_fifos = (struct pollfd*)malloc(num_minet_fds *
01331                                                  sizeof(struct pollfd));
01332         for (int i=0; i<num_minet_fds; i++)
01333 {
01334             minet_fifos[i].fd = open(sock2app_fifo_name, O_RDWR);
01335             minet_fifos[i].events = minet_fds[i].events;
01336             minet_fifos[i].revents = minet_fds[i].revents;
01337         }
01338         int revnts = poll(minet_fifos, num_minet_fds, timeout);
01339         if (revnts)
01340         {
01341             SockLibRequestResponse slrr = SockLibRequestResponse(mPOLL,
01342                                           Connection(),
01343                                           UNSPECIFIED_SOCK,
01344                                           Buffer(),
01345                                           0, 0,
01346                                           num_minet_fds,
01347                                           *minet_fifos);
01348             slrr.Serialize (tosock);
01349             slrr.Unserialize (fromsock);
01350         }
01351         else
01352         {
01353             int ctr=0;
01354             for (int j=0; j<num_minet_fds; j++)
01355                 if (minet_fds[j].revents) ctr++;
01356             return (ctr);
01357         }
01358         return (revnts);
01359 #endif
01360         break;
01361     default:
01362         minet_errno=ENODEV;
01363         return -1;
01364         break;
01365     }
01366 }
01367 
01368 
01369 EXTERNC int minet_poll_ex (struct pollfd *minet_fds,
01370                            int            num_minet_fds,
01371                            struct pollfd *unix_fds,
01372                            int            num_unix_fds,
01373                            int            timeout)
01374 {
01375     switch (socket_type)
01376     {
01377     case UNINIT_SOCKS:
01378         errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
01379         return (-1);
01380         break;
01381     case KERNEL_SOCKS:
01382         return (poll (minet_fds, num_minet_fds, timeout));
01383         break;
01384     case MINET_SOCKS:
01385 #if SELECTPOLL_BROKEN
01386         return ENOT_IMPLEMENTED;
01387 #else
01388 
01389         struct pollfd *minet_fifos = (struct pollfd*)malloc(num_minet_fds *
01390                                                  sizeof(struct pollfd));
01391         for (int i=0; i<num_minet_fds; i++)
01392 {
01393             minet_fifos[i].fd = open(sock2app_fifo_name, O_RDWR);
01394             minet_fifos[i].events = minet_fds[i].events;
01395             minet_fifos[i].revents = minet_fds[i].revents;
01396         }
01397         int revnts = poll(minet_fifos, num_minet_fds, timeout);
01398         if (revnts)
01399         {
01400             SockLibRequestResponse slrr = SockLibRequestResponse(mPOLL,
01401                                           Connection(),
01402                                           UNSPECIFIED_SOCK,
01403                                           Buffer(),
01404                                           0, 0,
01405                                           num_minet_fds,
01406                                           *minet_fifos);
01407             slrr.Serialize (tosock);
01408             slrr.Unserialize (fromsock);
01409         }
01410         else
01411         {
01412             int ctr=0;
01413             for (int j=0; j<num_minet_fds; j++)
01414                 if (minet_fds[j].revents) ctr++;
01415             return (ctr ||
01416                     poll(unix_fds, num_unix_fds, timeout));
01417         }
01418         return (revnts ||
01419                 poll(unix_fds, num_unix_fds, timeout));
01420 #endif
01421         break;
01422     default:
01423         minet_errno=ENODEV;
01424         return -1;
01425         break;
01426     }
01427 }
01428 
01433 EXTERNC int minet_set_nonblocking (int sockfd)
01434 {
01435     switch (socket_type)
01436     {
01437     case UNINIT_SOCKS:
01438         errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
01439         return (-1);
01440         break;
01441     case KERNEL_SOCKS:
01442     {
01443         int val = 1;
01444         int x = ioctl (sockfd, FIONBIO, &val);
01445         if (x)
01446             return (-1);
01447         return 0;
01448     }
01449     break;
01450     case MINET_SOCKS:
01451     {
01452         SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mSET_NONBLOCKING,
01453                                     Connection(),
01454                                     sockfd,
01455                                     Buffer(),
01456                                     0, 0);
01457         MinetSend(sock,slrr);
01458         MinetReceive(sock,slrr);
01459         minet_errno = slrr.error;
01460         if (minet_errno != EOK)
01461             return (-1);
01462         return (0);
01463     }
01464     break;
01465     default:
01466         minet_errno=ENODEV;
01467         return -1;
01468         break;
01469     }
01470 }
01471

01473 EXTERNC int minet_set_blocking (int sockfd)
01474 {
01475     switch (socket_type)
01476     {
01477     case UNINIT_SOCKS:
01478         errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
01479         return (-1);
01480         break;
01481     case KERNEL_SOCKS:
01482     {
01483         int val = 0;
01484         int x = ioctl (sockfd, FIONBIO, &val);
01485         if (x)
01486             return (-1);
01487         return 0;
01488     }
01489     break;
01490     case MINET_SOCKS:
01491     {
01492         SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mSET_BLOCKING,
01493                                     Connection(),
01494                                     sockfd,
01495                                     Buffer(),
01496                                     0, 0);
01497         MinetSend(sock,slrr);
01498         MinetReceive(sock,slrr);
01499         minet_errno = slrr.error;
01500         if (minet_errno != EOK)
01501             return (-1);
01502         return (0);
01503     }
01504     break;
01505     default:
01506         minet_errno=ENODEV;
01507         return -1;
01508         break;
01509     }

01513 EXTERNC int minet_can_write_now (int sockfd)
01514 {
01515     switch (socket_type)
01516     {
01517     case UNINIT_SOCKS:
01518         errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
01519         return (-1);
01520         break;
01521     case KERNEL_SOCKS:
01522         fd_set write_fds;
01523         FD_ZERO(&write_fds);
01524         FD_SET(sockfd, &write_fds);
01525         return (select(sockfd+1, NULL, &write_fds, NULL, 0));
01526         break;
01527     case MINET_SOCKS:
01528     {
01529         SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mCAN_WRITE_NOW,
01530                                     Connection(),
01531                                     sockfd,
01532                                     Buffer(),
01533                                     0, 0);
01534         MinetSend(sock,slrr);
01535         MinetReceive(sock,slrr);
01536         minet_errno = slrr.error;
01537         if (minet_errno != EOK)
01538             return (-1);
01539         return (0);
01540     }
01541     break;
01542     default:
01543         minet_errno=ENODEV;
01544         return -1;
01545         break;
01546     }
01547 }

01550 EXTERNC int minet_can_read_now (int sockfd)
01551 {
01552     switch (socket_type)
01553     {
01554     case UNINIT_SOCKS:
01555         errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
01556         return (-1);
01557         break;
01558     case KERNEL_SOCKS:
01559         fd_set read_fds;
01560         FD_ZERO(&read_fds);
01561         FD_SET(sockfd, &read_fds);
01562         return (select(sockfd+1, &read_fds, NULL, NULL, 0));
01563         break;
01564     case MINET_SOCKS:
01565     {
01566         SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mCAN_READ_NOW,
01567                                     Connection(),
01568                                     sockfd,
01569                                     Buffer(),
01570                                     0, 0);
01571         MinetSend(sock,slrr);
01572         MinetReceive(sock,slrr);
01573         minet_errno = slrr.error;
01574         if (minet_errno != EOK)
01575             return (-1);
01576         return (0);
01577     }
01578     break;
01579     default:
01580         minet_errno=ENODEV;
01581         return -1;
01582         break;
01583     }
